item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This post is used to test whether the deployment to GitHub Pages works, or not.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my blog. I’m a data and visualization enthusiast working in research and development. In my free time, I try to keep up with the development in data and analytics fields. I started this blog because I needed a way to document my learnings. In my work and personal projects I encounter things like new tools and methods all the time. I wanted to have a place to record what I have done.
